name: heavyweight
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] a boxer who is in the heaviest weight group, or this division of boxing weight: He was short for a heavyweight and had only a short reach.heavyweight champion Mike Tyson was heavyweight champion of the world.heavyweight title Ali defeated Sonny Liston in 1964 for the world heavyweight title. at heavyweight He has held world titles at light heavyweight and, briefly, at heavyweight. Compare

light heavyweight
lightweight

superheavyweight
welterweight
[ C ] a person or thing that is important or serious and that other people notice: Her extraordinary intelligence and speaking ability made her a political heavyweight. Compare
lightweight adjective (NOT SERIOUS) disapproving
